short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Bringing all your favorite tools into one. Honeypot scan, rug check, and getting the links you need in one place.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The defi space is a very dangerous one, that's for sure. With everything happening very fast it's often difficult to go to another site to run a scan on a contract just to come back and see it hit an all time high. 

This extension will bring the most useful tools all in one spot making avoiding honeypots that much easier. 

Make sure to join our discord as we journey through the defi space.
